<a id="class_ResourceImporterImage"></a>

# ResourceImporterImage

**Inherits:** [ResourceImporter](class_resourceimporter.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Imports an image for use in scripting, with no rendering capabilities.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This importer imports [Image](class_image.md) resources, as opposed to [CompressedTexture2D](class_compressedtexture2d.md). If you need to render the image in 2D or 3D, use [ResourceImporterTexture](class_resourceimportertexture.md) instead.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Importing images](../tutorials/assets_pipeline/importing_images.md)
